DOC.brief_summary: Research the genetic and biomechanical markers of human adipose tissue on patients with morbid obesity. Additional tissue/fluid collection is also gathered during the time of surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Genetic and Biochemical Characteristics of Human Adipose Tissue
DOC.criteria: Meet NIH Criteria for Bariatric Surgery Between the Age of 1865 Dyslipidemia controlled with medication Uncontrolled Metabolic syndrome (uncontrolled diabetes, htn, dyslipidemia), one or all conditions.
DOC.keyword: Bariatric Surgery, Obesity, White Adipose Tissue
